description: Follow reaction as Hibernian lose their Europa Conference League opener in Andorra against Inter d'Escaldes.
title: Hibs lose in Andorra in Europa Conference League - reaction
title_page: Hibs lose in Andorra in Europa Conference League - reaction - BBC Sport
maintext:
Cheerio
FT: Inter Club d'Escaldes 2-1 Hibernian
That's all from us tonight.
You'll get reaction from the Hibs camp on their dedicated BBC Sport news page.
Thanks for joining us.
BBC to show second leg in Leith
FT: Inter Club d'Escaldes 2-1 Hibernian
Hibs fans, I appreciate the last thing you want to think about right now is watching your team again.
But here's a gentle reminder that we will be showing next Thursday's second leg at Easter Road.
You'll be raring to go by then, eh?
Post
FT: Inter Club d'Escaldes 2-1 Hibernian
Aside from that late, late free-kick from Joe Newell, the only positive thing you can say about that for Hibs is that they have another 90 minutes to put that right.
At Easter Road, you surely have to think they can't replicate that level of performance.
Post
Inter Club d'Escaldes 2-1 Hibernian
Can't disagree with any of that from Rory.
Joe Newell has easily been Hibs' best player. But, my days, it's not been hard.
Post
Inter Club d'Escaldes 2-1 Hibernian
Rory Loy
Former Dundee & St Mirren forward on BBC Scotland
In terms of pass marks, I maybe should have mentioned Joe Newell.
You have to say the goalkeeper should do better but Hibs will not care a jot because that is a massive goal in this tie.
Since he's come on you have to say Newell has made a difference.
Post
Inter Club d'Escaldes 2-1 Hibernian
There was a guy lying on the ground behind the wall and that still found a way through.
Can't work out how tbh.
Post
Inter Club d'Escaldes 2-0 Hibernian
Rory Loy
Former Dundee & St Mirren forward on BBC Scotland
In fairness to Elie Youan, he never hides.
He makes mistake after mistake at times but he's never stopped looking for the ball.
That's the reason he's stayed on the pitch, he still looks like Hibs most likely goalscorer.
Post
Inter Club d'Escaldes 2-0 Hibernian
A diagonal ball to the back post from Joe Newell is met by Christian Doidge, who tries to knock down to Adam Le Fondre.
The Hibs striker can't get on the end of it though.
Post
Inter Club d'Escaldes 2-0 Hibernian
For minute it looks like Inter are away to add a third.
But the attack breaks down with a poor pass before Jean-Luc blasts over.
Hibs need to be careful. Very, very careful.
